query: Next.js Image component layout fill deprecated

curated_results.title: Next.js Image Component | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: The layout prop has been removed in Next.js 13. Use the fill prop instead to maintain aspect ratio and fill the container.

curated_results.title: Upgrading: Version 13 | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: Breaking changes in Next.js 13 including Image component layout prop removal and migration to new fill prop.

curated_results.title: next/image Changes - Next.js Blog
curated_results.snippet: The Next.js Image component has been updated with improved performance and new props. The layout prop is deprecated.
